thread.section_title: Oak Motors Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oak Motors | www.oakmotors.com
thread.title: DELIAH GARRETT
thread.title_full: Oak Motors reviewed by DELIAH GARRETT

author: DELIAH GARRETT
title: DELIAH GARRETT
text: Our experience with Oak Motors was fantastic. They were upfront and honest about what we could afford. We didn't test drive a vehicle until we were approved. We were allowed to walk the lot without a salesman, note any vehicles we were interested in and questions and even take our time test driving by ourselves without a salesman. We had a car within a matter of hours and experienced a no pressure sale! Thanks Oak Motors for making our car buying experience a pleasure and something enjoyable!
